job_tasks.phrase: exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core responsibilities of building and scaling software systems, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the software engineering aspect of building a platform for LLM applications, including design and construction.

job_tasks.phrase: work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.
job_tasks.justification: This details specific software development activities related to cloud infrastructure, APIs, and security.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct instruction for implementing backend systems, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration and collaboration aspects of software development across different teams.
Kubernetes is a key technology in MLOps and cloud-native operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.
job_tasks.justification: Testing, instrumentation, and documentation are integral parts of the software development lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on backend software engineering, cloud-native development, and distributed systems with Kubernetes. While it mentions LLMs as a context, it doesn't describe tasks directly related to developing, fine-tuning, or engineering GenAI models themselves, which is the core of a GenAI Engineer role.
